Spoilers for Top Boy season 3

The latest series of Top Boy from Netflix has left the show with a whole new legion of fans.

The crime drama series primarily follows the criminal exploits of Dushane (Ashley Walters), who finds himself coming under threat from multiple nemeses.

Two figures that emerged in season 3 were two struggling junkies named Lee and Sarah who popped up a lot across the series, but it became clear the pair were hiding something as the episodes progressed, with Sarah pretending to have gotten drunk and Lee making some strange remarks after being punched in the face.

Now Netflix has released a revealing video via the official Twitter page for the series, with the caption: "TOP BOY: The Final Twist Broken Down **SPOILERS AHEAD**"

The video makes it crystal clear for Top Boy fans that two of the police officers looking at the board of evidence on Dushane are, in fact, Lee and Sarah!

If they were two characters you didn't trust, then you were right as they appear to be undercover cops.

Needless to say, some fans replied to the clip with shock and awe.

One fan replied: "What a twist, quality ending and can't wait for the next series #HurryUpNewSeries "

They weren't alone, as another wrote: "Was shocked never saw that coming awesome"

Another noted: "My jaw hit the floor with this!"

One summed up the general feeling, saying: It’s just crazy. I couldn't believe the ending. It got me like WTF. Can’t wait for the next season."

We'll just have to wait and look forward to Top Boy season 4.

Top Boy season 3 is available on Netflix now.

Are you a fan of Top Boy? Let us know what you think in the comments below.
description: SPOILERS: Top Boy season 3 came to quite a finish, with a shocking twist in store for Dushane
